name: Noir-GG-p Agent 5
author: Noir-GG-p
description: A monitoring-focused agent capable of system health checks, performance alerts, and real-time logging for Nebulai AgentSpace.
documentation: Noir-GG-p Agent 5 is optimized for system monitoring, real-time performance alerts, and continuous logging to ensure system stability and quick issue detection.
limitations: Limited to email-based notifications. Does not currently support SMS or push notifications.
futureImprovements: Integrate SMS and push notification support.
Enable customizable alert levels per resource type.
